cells.data:
SSH to solutions.brightcove.com using BCLS credentials

cd /var/www/html/bcls/bcls-proxy
forever restart bcls-proxy.js

should see a response like this:
info:    Forever restarted process(es):
data:        uid  command       script        forever pid  logfile                      uptime
data:    [0] 5eqg /usr/bin/node bcls-proxy.js 12471   9591 /home/bcls/.forever/5eqg.log 0:2:52:48.165
